tutorial.Rmd
title: “COSMOS-tutorial”
author: “A. Dugourd and A. Gabor”
date: “11/10/2020”
output: rmarkdown::html_vignette
vignette: >
%
% 
library(cosmos)
##

tutorial section: signaling to metabolism

meta_network <- cosmos:::meta_network_test
signaling_data <- cosmos:::signaling_input_test
expression_data <- cosmos:::expression_data_test
metabolic_data <- cosmos:::metabolic_data_test


res <- preprocess_COSMOS_signaling_to_metabolism(signaling_data = signaling_data,
                                                 meta_network = meta_network,
                                                 metabolic_data = metabolic_data,
                                                 diff_expression_data = expression_data,
                                                 remove_unexpressed_nodes = TRUE,
                                                 filter_tf_gene_interaction_by_optimization = FALSE)
## 'select()' returned 1:1 mapping between keys and columns
## 'select()' returned 1:many mapping between keys and columns
## [1] "COSMOS: all 118 signaling nodes from data were found in the meta PKN"
## [1] "COSMOS: all 40 metabolic nodes from data were found in the meta PKN"
## [1] "COSMOS: 4666 of the 15919 genes in expression data were found as transcription factor target"
## [1] "COSMOS: 4666 of the 5318 transcription factor targets were found in expression data"
## [1] "COSMOS: removing unexpressed nodes from PKN..."
## [1] "COSMOS: 25739 interactions removed"
## [1] "COSMOS: removing nodes that are not reachable from inputs within 8 steps"
## [1] "COSMOS: 8418 from  66749 interactions are removed from the PKN"
## [1] "COSMOS: 1 input/measured nodes are not in PKN any more: X5090 and 0 more."
## [1] "COSMOS: 13 input/measured nodes are not in PKN any more: XMetab__190___e____, XMetab__9750___e____, XMetab__9750___m____, XMetab__5961___e____, XMetab__5961___m____, XMetab__6804___l____ and 7 more."
## [1] "COSMOS: removing nodes that are not observable by measurements within 8 steps"
## [1] "COSMOS: 17976 from  58331 interactions are removed from the PKN"
## [1] "COSMOS: 14 input/measured nodes are not in PKN any more: X4137, X26298, X79977, X51621, X7975, X4211 and 8 more."
## [1] "COSMOS:  1247 interactions are removed from the PKN based on consistency check between TF activity and gene expression"
## [1] "COSMOS: all 103 signaling nodes from data were found in the meta PKN"
## [1] "COSMOS: all 27 metabolic nodes from data were found in the meta PKN"
## [1] "COSMOS: 4666 of the 15919 genes in expression data were found as transcription factor target"
## [1] "COSMOS: 4666 of the 5318 transcription factor targets were found in expression data"
CARNIVAL_options = cosmos::default_CARNIVAL_options()
CARNIVAL_options$solverPath = "/Applications/CPLEX_Studio128/cplex/bin/x86-64_osx/cplex"

res_network = run_COSMOS_signaling_to_metabolism(data = res,
                                                 CARNIVAL_options = CARNIVAL_options,
                                                 test_run=TRUE)

tutorial section: metabolism to signaling

meta_network <- cosmos:::meta_network_test
signaling_data <- cosmos:::signaling_input_test
expression_data <- cosmos:::expression_data_test
metabolic_data <- cosmos:::metabolic_data_test


res <- preprocess_COSMOS_metabolism_to_signaling(signaling_data = signaling_data,
                                                 meta_network = meta_network,
                                                 metabolic_data = metabolic_data,
                                                 diff_expression_data = expression_data,
                                                 filter_tf_gene_interaction_by_optimization = FALSE)
## 'select()' returned 1:1 mapping between keys and columns
## 'select()' returned 1:many mapping between keys and columns
## [1] "COSMOS: all 118 signaling nodes from data were found in the meta PKN"
## [1] "COSMOS: all 40 metabolic nodes from data were found in the meta PKN"
## [1] "COSMOS: 4666 of the 15919 genes in expression data were found as transcription factor target"
## [1] "COSMOS: 4666 of the 5318 transcription factor targets were found in expression data"
## [1] "COSMOS: removing unexpressed nodes from PKN..."
## [1] "COSMOS: 25739 interactions removed"
## [1] "COSMOS: removing nodes that are not reachable from inputs within 8 steps"
## [1] "COSMOS: 9995 from  66749 interactions are removed from the PKN"
## [1] "COSMOS: 11 input/measured nodes are not in PKN any more: X91754, X8289, X6928, X3174, X3720, X4152 and 5 more."
## [1] "COSMOS: 2 input/measured nodes are not in PKN any more: XMetab__439155___e____, XMetab__1110___x____ and 0 more."
## [1] "COSMOS: removing nodes that are not observable by measurements within 8 steps"
## [1] "COSMOS: 17281 from  56754 interactions are removed from the PKN"
## [1] "COSMOS: 12 input/measured nodes are not in PKN any more: XMetab__190___e____, XMetab__6132___m____, XMetab__6132___e____, XMetab__6021___e____, XMetab__6426851___c____, XMetab__107738___c____ and 6 more."
## [1] "COSMOS:  1257 interactions are removed from the PKN based on consistency check between TF activity and gene expression"
## [1] "COSMOS: all 107 signaling nodes from data were found in the meta PKN"
## [1] "COSMOS: all 26 metabolic nodes from data were found in the meta PKN"
## [1] "COSMOS: 4666 of the 15919 genes in expression data were found as transcription factor target"
## [1] "COSMOS: 4666 of the 5318 transcription factor targets were found in expression data"
CARNIVAL_options = cosmos::default_CARNIVAL_options()
CARNIVAL_options$solverPath = "/Applications/CPLEX_Studio128/cplex/bin/x86-64_osx/cplex"

res_network = run_COSMOS_metabolism_to_signaling(data = res,
                                                 CARNIVAL_options = CARNIVAL_options,
                                                 test_run=TRUE)
